# Pull Request

## Description / 描述

Please include a summary of the change and which issue is fixed. Please also include relevant motivation and context.
請包含變更摘要和修復的問題。也請包含相關動機和背景。

Fixes # (issue)

## Type of change / 變更類型

Please delete options that are not relevant.
請刪除不相關的選項。

- [ ] Bug fix / Bug 修復 (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature / 新功能 (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change / 破壞性變更 (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] Documentation update / 文檔更新
- [ ] Performance improvement / 效能改進
- [ ] Code refactoring / 程式碼重構
- [ ] Test improvement / 測試改進

## How Has This Been Tested? / 如何測試？

Please describe the tests that you ran to verify your changes. Provide instructions so we can reproduce.
請描述您執行的測試以驗證您的變更。提供說明以便我們重現。

- [ ] Unit tests / 單元測試
- [ ] Integration tests / 整合測試
- [ ] Manual testing / 手動測試

**Test Configuration / 測試配置:**
- .NET Version: 
- OS: 
- NPOIPlus Version:

## Code Quality Checklist / 程式碼品質檢查清單

- [ ] My code follows the style guidelines of this project / 我的程式碼遵循此專案的風格指南
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code / 我已對自己的程式碼進行自我審查
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas / 我已註解我的程式碼，特別是難以理解的地方
- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation / 我已對文檔進行相應的變更
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings / 我的變更不會產生新的警告
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works / 我已添加證明修復有效或功能正常的測試
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes / 新的和現有的單元測試在本地通過我的變更
- [ ] Any dependent changes have been merged and published in downstream modules / 任何依賴的變更已在下游模組中合併和發布

## Screenshots / 螢幕截圖

If applicable, add screenshots to help explain your changes.
如果適用，請添加螢幕截圖以幫助解釋您的變更。

## Additional Notes / 附加說明

Add any other notes about the PR here.
在此添加關於 PR 的任何其他說明。

## Breaking Changes / 破壞性變更

If this PR introduces breaking changes, please describe what users need to do to migrate their code.
如果此 PR 引入破壞性變更，請描述使用者需要做什麼來遷移他們的程式碼。

```csharp
// Before / 之前
// ...

// After / 之後
// ...
```

## Related Issues / 相關 Issues

List any related issues here.
在此列出任何相關的 issues。

- Related to #
- Closes #
- Depends on #
